audioText: Mon grand-père adorait raconter des histoires fascinantes de son époque pendant les longues soirées d'hiver près de la cheminée.
question: What did the grandfather love to do?
options: Tell fascinating stories from his era during long winter evenings by the fireplace
Read classical literature aloud to the entire family
Play traditional card games with visiting neighbors
Teach traditional crafts and skills to younger generations
explanation: The text states 'Mon grand-père adorait raconter des histoires fascinantes de son époque pendant les longues soirées d'hiver près de la cheminée.' - My grandfather loved to tell fascinating stories from his era during long winter evenings by the fireplace. 'Adorait' is the third person singular imperfect form of 'adorer' (to love).
